title: When building msbuild source code(mono/msbuild repo), build.sh doesn't work properly in Linux
body:
### Steps to reproduce
running build.sh

### Expected behavior
Build.sh download dotnet sdk 3.1.100 and extract it into msbuild/.dotnet/sdk/3.1.100, then copy files from sdk/3.1.100. 

### Actual behavior
Build.sh download dotnet sdk 3.1.100 and extract it into msbuild/.dotnet/sdk/3.1.100, then copy files from sdk/3.0.100.  caused file not found errors 


OS info:
SLES 12.4

nodes.body: cc @radical I guess there was no way to file an issue against the mono/ version of this repo
